author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. Dying to make jalapeño popper pull apart bread. Wow! 2. Super sad to take down Valentine’s day in our house. It might be my favorite little holiday to decorate for?! 3. Real strategies to calm down. Oh wow, I LOVE this. 4. I am still in a book hangover since reading The Favorites last […]
text: 1. Dying to make jalapeño popper pull apart bread. Wow! 2. Super sad to take down Valentine’s day in our house. It might be my favorite little holiday to decorate for?! 3. Real strategies to calm down. Oh wow, I LOVE this. 4. I am still in a book hangover since reading The Favorites last month. Nothing is curing it! 5. I need to send more voice notes. 6. TV things! I watched the Gabby Petito doc. Ugh. I also watched the first episode of The Baldwins. 7. We should all be lemonading. 8. The SAG awards dresses… Kerry Washington and Keri Russel! Obsessed. Also Leighton Meester. Perfection. 9. Okay I think it’s time for a hot pants margarita.
html:
1. Dying to make jalapeño popper pull apart bread. Wow!

2. Super sad to take down Valentine’s day in our house. It might be my favorite little holiday to decorate for?!

3. Real strategies to calm down. Oh wow, I LOVE this.

4. I am still in a book hangover since reading The Favorites last month. Nothing is curing it!

5. I need to send more voice notes.

6. TV things! I watched the Gabby Petito doc. Ugh. I also watched the first episode of The Baldwins.

7. We should all be lemonading.

8. The SAG awards dresses… Kerry Washington and Keri Russel! Obsessed. Also Leighton Meester. Perfection.

9. Okay I think it’s time for a hot pants margarita.
